title: Can't login?
body: Keeps prompting me to change my password, but when I go to change my password nothing happens.

replies.body:
There were a couple issues with the League Support Site as well as the login queues earlier -_-'.

I believe the password reset _should_ be working again, but if not shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can help there!
